channel.title: Python functions don't work after declaration
channel.description:
Hi!
I want to build a metric tree in redash, but for this i need to preprocess input data that i get from database. I tried to declare functions but got error. At docs is written "The Python query runner lets you run **arbitrary** Python 3 scripts", is it possible to work with python functions in redash? ![image|690x83](upload://st9NpoXluS1fEAq8v4R9VgRY6ZI.jpeg)

item.title: Python functions don't work after declaration

I want to build a metric tree in redash, but for this i need to preprocess input data that i get from database. I tried to declare functions but got error. At docs is written “The Python query runner lets you run arbitrary Python 3 scripts”, is it possible to work with python functions in redash?

Read full topic
